#include <stdio.h>
#include <string>
#include <algorithm>
#include <math.h>
#include <iostream>
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
 
int abso(int a)
{
    if (a>=0)
        return a;
    else return (-1*a);
}
 
int main() {
    int n,count=1;
    scanf ("%d",&n);
    while (n!=0)
    {
        int a[n],sum=0,avg,turns=0;
        for (int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            scanf ("%d",&a[i]);
            sum=sum+a[i];
        }
        avg=sum/n;
        for (int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            if (a[i]!=avg)
                turns=turns+abso(avg-a[i]);
        }
        printf ("Set #%d\n",count);
        printf ("The minimum number of moves is %d.\n",turns/2);
        count++;
        scanf ("%d",&n);
    }
	return 0;
}
